links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (17,-95,199,-120).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[1 / ((1 - x) (1 - 3 x) (1 - 5 x) (1 - 8 x)), {x, 0, 20}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 10 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) m:=25; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); Coefficients(R!(1/((1-x)*(1-3*x)*(1-5*x)*(1-8*x)))); /+ or */ I:=[1, 17, 194, 1882]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 17*Self(n-1)-95*Self(n-2)+199*Self(n-3)-120*Self(n-4): n in [1..25]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 10 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
